thread.title: Photo: Fire at a heavy equipment supplier in Isando, Gauteng, South Africa; the smoke has shut highways and is affecting flights at OR Tambo International Airport - @benonicitytimes
thread.title_full: Photo: Fire at a heavy equipment supplier in Isando, Gauteng, South Africa; the smoke has shut highways and is affecting flights at OR Tambo International Airport - @benonicitytimes

author: Tricia McDermott
title: Photo: Fire at a heavy equipment supplier in Isando, Gauteng, South Africa; the smoke has shut highways and is affecting flights at OR Tambo International Airport - @benonicitytimes
text:
Community Announcements UPDATE: Isando fire: Highways and flights affected The fire at Barlow World in Isando has resulted in the R21 and R24 being closed for traffic as a result of heavy smoke. 7 hours ago 
Flights to and from O R Tambo Airport are also delayed. 
Read more on wwww.kemptonexpress.co.za.
